item.title: America’s Game
item.description: We tell you everything you need to know about this year’s Super Bowl.

item.title: Europe Accuses TikTok of ‘Addictive Design’ and Pushes for Change
item.description: European Union regulators said the app’s infinite scroll and personalized algorithm led to “compulsive” behavior, especially among children.

item.title: U.S. and Iran Set for Talks in Oman
item.description: Middle Eastern diplomats see a chance for progress on Iran’s nuclear program, but they are pessimistic about other U.S. demands.

item.title: The Growing List of Names in the Epstein Files, and the Federal Investigation into D.E.I. at Nike
Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show
item.description: Repairs at key missile sites began soon after they were hit by Israeli and U.S. strikes last year, but work at Iran’s nuclear facilities has been slow...
